name: avocationally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
as an interest or hobby and not as part of a person's regular job: She pursued photography avocationally for many years before she was hired as a staff photographer for a magazine. He plays guitar avocationally and sometimes sits in with bands playing local clubs.
More examplesFewer examplesShe pursued drawing comics avocationally in college, and now she makes a living drawing and writing her own daily strip. Most of his woodworking projects were done avocationally, including the gazebo he built in his backyard.
